EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - GSI - Mobile+ - 2015.10.29.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Webinar - Tosca Mobile+
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
When breaking into the mobile market, testing complexity and costs can compound so quickly that a high degree of test automation is required for success.
Join our exclusive partner webinar, in which Georg Thurner, Product Manager at Tricentis, will show how Tosca Mobile+ provides cutting edge end-to-end testing solutions for mobile apps, cross-OS and cross device by:
- Preparing your applications for testing - Testing native mobile applications - Testing mobile web applications, including responsive web pages
We look forward to welcoming you at our webinar on October 29th, 2015 at 3:30 PM Indian Standard Time!
Best regards,
The Tricentis Webinar Team
